title: A French nun survived the Spanish flu and both world wars. Now she’s beaten covid-19 days before she turns 117.
content:
1. A French nun survived the Spanish flu and both world wars. Now she’s beaten covid-19 days before she turns 117.  Washington Post
  2. Europe's oldest person survives Covid just before 117th birthday  BBC News
  3. 116-Year-Old French Nun, World's Second-Oldest Person, Beats Covid Infection | NBC News NOW  NBC News
  4. Was it T-cells or prayer? 116-year-old nun survives COVID-19  Fox News
  5. World’s second-oldest person turning 117 this week after surviving COVID-19  WGN-TV
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: 一位法国修女在西班牙流感和两次世界大战中幸存下来。现在她在117岁前的19天战胜了科维德。
一位法國修女在西班牙流感和兩次世界大戰中倖存下來。現在她在117歲前的19天戰勝了科維德。
